exclusion.criterion: Regular use of vitamin D supplements
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Don't drink milk or eat cheese or yogurt
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment for biochemically confirmed vitamin D deficiency
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known or suspected medical conditions associated with bone and vitamin D including rickets, osteomalacia, liver disease, renal disease, immobilization (complete or partial), fractures, and disorders of the parathyroid gland
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known or suspected chronic illness of childhood, such as asthma, cancer, Crohn's disease, nephrotic syndrome, rheumatic conditions, and diabetes, etc
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Use in the past 3 months of medications known to affect bone and/or mineral ion homeostasis
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone, which is a medical condition associated with bone and vitamin D. They are also lactose intolerant and have used vitamin D supplements in the past.
